alert.note: Alert for Campbell; McPherson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Campbell and northwestern McPherson Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 715 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Artas, or 12 miles northwest of Eureka, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Greenway around 720 PM CDT. Eureka around 735 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Aberdeen.
